thread.title: A Market Street flatiron with an Art Deco sheen
thread.title_full: A Market Street flatiron with an Art Deco sheen - San Francisco Chronicle

author: John King
title: A Market Street flatiron with an Art Deco sheen
text:
Photo: John King, The Chronicle This flatiron building on Market Street near Church Street was builtin 1904 -- but you wouldn't know that by the Art Deco ornamentation below the windows and along the cornice. Even back in 1930, buildings owners would do their best to look up-to-date. This flatiron building on Market Street near Church Street was...
The craze for fashion makeovers, architectural style, has been with us so long that once-trendy changes can evoke the distant past. This flatiron building on Market Street near Church Street was builtin 1904 -- but you wouldn't know that by the Art Deco ornamentation below the windows and along the cornice.
